Content-Length: 891

Quickstrike:




Making it to the roof of the base, Quickstrike transformed to robot 
mode. He couldn't possibly think of how many times his beast mode 
came in handy. He carefully walked across the top, with his feet 
clicking against the metal frame. His feet were the best thing with a 
smooth, uneven surface. 

He stopped beside the hatchway of the roof. He had a feeling almost 
every base had one. It looked like this one did. He crouched down and 
prode the fangs of his cobra arm under the slit and struggled to lift 
it up. He pulled until the base of the fangs began to hurt. He wasn't 
stupid enough to keep doing it until he broke them off, so he 
stopped, and pondered at the situation. The slagging thing was locked.

He tried another method. He aimed his cobra arm into the hinge of the 
hatch and fired continuously into it, making the beam of energy melt 
the metal down.
